apiDescription: An iterator to maintain state while iterating another iterator.
This struct is created by the scan method on Iterator. See its documentation for more.

trait implementations.name: impl<B, I, St, F> std::iter::Iterator for std::iter::Scan<I, St, F> where F: std::ops::FnMut(&mut St, <I as std::iter::Iterator>::std::iter::Iterator::Item) -> std::option::Option<B>, I: std::iter::Iterator
impl<I, St, F> std::clone::Clone for std::iter::Scan<I, St, F> where F: std::clone::Clone, I: std::clone::Clone, St: std::clone::Clone
impl<I, St, F> std::fmt::Debug for std::iter::Scan<I, St, F> where I: std::fmt::Debug, St: std::fmt::Debug
impl<I, St, F> std::marker::Send for std::iter::Scan<I, St, F> where F: std::marker::Send, I: std::marker::Send, St: std::marker::Send
impl<I, St, F> std::marker::Sync for std::iter::Scan<I, St, F> where F: std::marker::Sync, I: std::marker::Sync, St: std::marker::Sync
